name: Enode
headline: An API for electric vehicles and other energy hardware (DERs)
description: Enode’s APIs enable you to instantly connect users’ energy devices — including EVs, solar inverters, home batteries and thermostats — to your app.

founders.name: Thorvald Thorsnes, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and sales rep at Enode. Previously founder of Photo Roulette, a mobile game with 20 + million users.

## One integration, 1000+ energy devices
Connect to your customers' energy devices to build experiences they love. Control and optimize those energy devices through your app, so customers can save money and cut their carbon footprint.
[Start building ](http://www.enode.com/<https:/developers.enode.com/register>)[Contact sales ](http://www.enode.com/</contact>)
![Illustration of various energy metrics displayed on a smartphone screen with the code used to fetch this data behind it](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_1376%2Cw_1504/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/illustrations/hero_home2%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)
## Join other industry leading companies in building the future of green energy apps
  * ![Fjordkraft logo](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_26%2Cw_120/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/customer-logos-new/fjordkraft%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)
  * ![OVO Energy logo](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_40%2Cw_98/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/customer-logos-new/ovo-energy%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)
  * ![Ostrom logo](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_24%2Cw_115.5/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/customer-logos-new/ostrom%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)
  * ![Amp X logo](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_20%2Cw_77.5/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/customer-logos-new/ampx%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)
  * ![Monta logo](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_18%2Cw_104/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/customer-logos-new/monta%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)


## Our platform
### Be the first mover in the future of energy
Enode’s APIs enable you to instantly connect users’ energy devices — including EVs, solar inverters, home batteries and thermostats — to your app. You can surface data, and then take action with it. Our out-of-the-box algorithms allow you to control and optimize your users’ energy devices.
A few lines of code will save you months of integration and ongoing maintenance. We cut the cost and complexity of building energy management apps, so you can focus on what matters: creating user-centric experiences that drive engagement, and accelerate the transition to a sustainable energy system.
With EnodeWithout Enode
1
    connection handled by you
80+
    connection handled by Enode
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_640%2Cw_1120/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/illustrations/platform_with%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)
## Connect
### Connect to and control thousands of energy devices
Connect to 1000+ EVs, solar panels, thermostats and more with one powerful API. Surface data from them all in your app.
  * One API integration
  * 80+ OEMs brands, 1000+ energy devices
  * SDKs and ready-built connection flows

[Learn more about Connect](http://www.enode.com/</connect>)
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_576%2Cw_704/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/illustrations/connect%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)
## Optimize
### Unlock smart energy use cases for your customers
Leverage out of the box algorithms for automated smart charging and energy device insights. Give your customers control of their energy consumption and costs.
  * Out-of-the-box smart charging APIs
  * Statistics and insights APIs
  * Endpoints to build your own features

[Learn more about Optimize](http://www.enode.com/</optimize>)
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_576%2Cw_704/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/illustrations/optimize%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)
## Aggregate
### Grow new sustainable energy revenue streams
Participate in flexibility markets by aggregating customers’ energy devices and loads. Create Virtual Power Plants (VPPs) that help balance supply and demand for renewable energy.
  * Monitoring, demand response and reporting APIs
  * Aggregation endpoints that are compatible with all major flexibility markets
  * Monetize assets with our local Demand Response partners

[Learn more about Aggregate](http://www.enode.com/</aggregate>)
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_576%2Cw_704/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/illustrations/aggregate%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)
## Use cases
### Smart charging
Automatically optimize EV charging
[Learn more about Smart charging ](http://www.enode.com/</use-cases#smart-charging>)
### Energy management and insights
Share the energy device data customers care about
[Learn more about Energy management and insights ](http://www.enode.com/</use-cases#energy-management-and-insights>)
### Demand response
Grow revenue from flexibility markets
[Learn more about Demand response ](http://www.enode.com/</use-cases#demand-response>)
### E-mobility
Enable smart route planning with rich EV data from public charging
[Learn more about E-mobility ](http://www.enode.com/</use-cases#e-mobility>)
## By developers, for developers
### A single API for hundreds of energy devices
Access and control 1000+ energy devices with a few lines of code. Save months of integration and ongoing maintenance.
  * A single RESTful API for all connections
  * Web and native SDKs for hardware connection
  * Enterprise grade security by design

[Read our docs](http://www.enode.com/<https:/developers.enode.com>)
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_576%2Cw_704/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/illustrations/developers%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)
## Why Enode
### Join other industry leading companies to accelerate green energy
The energy system of the future will include millions of connected energy devices. Those energy devices will be able to intelligently respond to fluctuations in renewable energy supply, so we can build and balance a sustainable grid. But they can only do that if all the nodes in the network – devices, energy apps, consumers and the grid – are connected, and able to speak to each other in real time.
At Enode, we deliver the infrastructure to control energy devices through apps, and optimize them for both consumers and the grid.
[About our company](http://www.enode.com/</about>)
  *  _250M+_ energy customers reached globally
  *  _1000+_ energy devices supported, covering 80+ brands and 5+ categories
  *  _100GWh+_ managed through the Enode platform
  *  _25%_ average savings using Enode's Smart Charging


## Industries and applications
[Learn more. about Enode use cases ](http://www.enode.com/</use-cases>)
  * ### Energy retailers
Create energy super-apps that increase retention and unlock revenue from flexibility markets
  * ### Energy startups and apps
Build market-leading energy apps that connect directly to your customers’ energy devices
  * ### E-mobility providers
Surface real-time EV and charging data from multiple OEMs in your app
  * ### DERMS
Create residential DR programs with direct access to customers’ EVs, thermostats and more
  * ### EV fleet managers
Access real-time SoC and location data for your entire fleet, at a fraction of the cost of OBD
  * ### Utility and grid owners
Use aggregated EV data to anticipate grid constraints and build demand response programs at scale
  * ### Smart home providers
Integrate EVs, thermostats and other energy devices into your solution, no hardware hub required
  * ### Don’t see your industry?
We partner with companies across the energy ecosystem. Reach out to see how we can help you lead the transition to a sustainable energy system.

## Ready to get started?
Start exploring our APIs for free with our [Starter plan](http://www.enode.com/</pricing>), or get in touch to have us put together a custom plan for your company.
[Start building](http://www.enode.com/<https:/developers.enode.com/register>)[Contact sales](http://www.enode.com/</contact>)
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/https://res.cloudinary.com/enodoio/image/upload/c_fit%2Ch_904%2Cw_1136/q_60/f_auto/v1/website/illustrations/getstarted%3F_a%3DDATAg1RiZAA0)

generated_description:
**Enode: Pioneering the Future of Green Energy Management**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from Oslo, Norway, Enode is at the forefront of the energy transition with its focus on creating APIs for electric vehicles (EVs) and other distributed energy resources (DERs). Part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, Enode's mission is clear: to provide a seamless way for developers to connect and control a plethora of energy devices through a single integration.

With a team of around 40, Enode has built a platform that allows developers to connect users’ energy devices—including EVs, solar inverters, home batteries, and smart thermostats—more efficiently. This means developers can create applications that not only control these devices but also optimize their performance and reduce energy costs for users. The Enode platform supports over 1,000 energy devices across more than 80 brands, offering a robust infrastructure for those looking to innovate in the clean energy sector.

**Core Offerings**  
Enode’s platform is divided into three primary services:
1. **Connect**: A simple API integration that allows users to manage energy devices at their fingertips.
2. **Optimize**: This feature enables smart energy use, allowing applications to leverage automated insights and algorithms to streamline energy consumption.
3. **Aggregate**: Here, businesses can participate in flexibility markets by aggregating energy loads, which ultimately opens new revenue streams through initiatives like virtual power plants (VPPs).

**Use Cases and Applications**  
The applications of Enode's technology are diverse, catering to various sectors including:
- **Energy retailers**: Creating competitive apps to retain customers.
- **E-mobility providers**: Leveraging data for EV and charging networks.
- **Smart home tech**: Seamlessly integrating numerous energy devices without additional hardware.

They also cover specific use cases such as smart charging, home energy management, and demand response systems, which enable real-time interactions between energy users and the grid.

**Why Enode Stands Out**  
What differentiates Enode is not just its technology but its goal of fostering a sustainable energy future. By connecting multiple devices and ensuring they communicate efficiently, Enode is helping build a more resilient grid that can adapt to fluctuations in renewable energy supply. With over 250 million energy customers reached and 100 gigawatt-hours managed through their platform, Enode is truly shaping the landscape of energy management.

In summary, Enode is a promising startup that presents a simple yet powerful solution for the complexities of managing energy in a greener future. If you're curious to learn more or wish to explore their offerings, visit [Enode's website](http://www.enode.com).
